briefTitle: Comparative Effectiveness of Pregnancy Failure Management Regimens
officialTitle: Comparative Effectiveness of Pregnancy Failure Management Regimens
summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the effectiveness of combination treatment (mifepristone premedication plus single-dose misoprostol) to single-dose misoprostol (standard of care) for the management of early pregnancy failure.

primaryOutcome.measure: Gestational Sac Expulsion With One Treatment Dose on Day 3 (Visit 2) and no Need for Additional Medical or Surgical Intervention Within 30 Days of Treatment.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 3 (visit 2) and up to 30 days following visit (to ensure surgical measures were not done
